body: god I love this doujin it has everything I love about it and I am addicted to it and I want more! I need more sequels to it
Leiferkison he/her still posts on Pixiv under the name ziz
Great story, you can now found ziz stuff under a new username @shotaparrot on twitter or https://poipiku.com/973072/ glad to see him back

Sad story guys, I heard the author/mangaka of this doujin quits social media, his twitter @dantariaaaan is deleted.
Some says he moved to a new social media with a new name.
But I have no idea beyond this. I've searched his pixiv and website but no updates.

If any of you have info on him, please share!
